main event: An oblong object colored red, orange, and white was observed for 30 minutes before disappearing overhead.
interesting points: The object was observed at a high altitude (12.15) and took 30 minutes to disappear., It flashed with brilliance during the observation period., The observation was categorized as a local ground-visual sighting., The object's motion was noted to be very slow., The report indicates insufficient data for identification of the object.
location: 15 mi SW Lead, South Dakota, USA
